selected_quotes: Placebo effects contribute substantially to the effectiveness of certain surgeries
Systematic review on the use of placebo controls in the evaluation of surgery: systematic review
The ethical arguments for sham surgical trials where feasible are overwhelming - invariably sham less complications
La mitad de las cirugías no son superiores a placebo lo llevo diciendo años.
Our review in BMJ - placebo controlled surgical trials provide invaluable knowledge - we need more

news.summary: Haut einritzen, ziellos einen Schlauch einführen und schon geht es dem Patienten besser: Auch Scheinoperationen helfen - und werfen die Frage auf, wie wirksam viele der neuen OP-Verfahren eigentlich sind.

news.title: 6 phony surgeries that take placebo to the extreme
news.summary: Most of the time, it’s easy to be in the placebo group of a clinical trial: no side effects, minimal annoyance, and you may even get paid for it.

news.title: Surgery isn't always the best option, and the decision shouldn't just lie with the doctor
news.summary: Surgeons often decide to perform procedures because that’s what’s usually done, it’s what they’re taught, it sounds logical or it fits with observations from their own practice.

news.title: Many operations could be unnecessary, says leading surgeon
news.summary: Hundreds of thousands of people could be undergoing unnecessary, risky and expensive surgeries as most procedures have never undergone the rigorous testing that drugs are subject to, a leading surgeon has said.

news.title: Many operations could be unnecessary, says leading surgeon
news.summary: More Hundreds of thousands of people could be undergoing unnecessary, risky and expensive surgeries as most procedures have never undergone the rigorous testing that drugs are subject to, a leading surgeon has said.

news.title: The weird power of the placebo effect, explained

Er kirurgi den største placebo af dem alle?
